title: **CELL CULTURE**
body: Culturing of cells on poly-lysine coated coverslips has been described previously<sup>7,8</sup>.

title: **INDIRECT IMMUNOFLUORESCENCE**
body: All incubations are carried out in a humidity chamber at room temperature.

body.body: Dissolve digitonin in DMSO; prepare stock solutions in DMSO that are 1,000 fold concentrated. Immediately before use, dilute digitonin into buffer B.
Incubate cells for 3 min at room temperature and remove liquid.
Wash once with cold buffer B, rinse with PBS and fix with 3.7% formaldehyde in PBS for 25 min.
Rinse with PBS; then move to step 5 or permeabilize with 0.1% Triton X-100 in PBS/2 mg/ml BSA/1 mM NaN<sub>3</sub> for 5 min.
Block with PBS/2 mg/ml BSA/1 mM NaN<sub>3</sub> \(blocking solution) for 1 h.
Incubate overnight with anti-lamin B antibodies \(0.5 μg/ml) in blocking solution.
Wash 3 times for 10 min with blocking solution, then incubate for 2 h with Cy3-labeled secondary antibodies \(3 μg/ml) in blocking solution.
Wash 3 times for 10 min with blocking solution, then incubate with 1 μg/ml DAPI in blocking solution for 2 min.
Mount specimen and seal with nail polish.

title: **IMAGE ACQUISITION**
body: Acquire images by confocal microscopy \(for example, Zeiss LSM510) using a 63x objective \(oil, NA = 1.4), pixel resolution of 0.65 μm, scan speed 5, four-line averaging<sup>9</sup>.

title: **PROCESSING OF IMAGES**
body: Process images with appropriate software such as Adobe Photoshop 8.0.
